com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Class Smc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol.Smc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SsdkInterface

    public class Smc
extends Object
implements SsdkInterface
    This class provides support for sharing and controlling content stored on a network device or web server on another device. This class represents the Media Control package and provides the package version number, version name, and initialization methods.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException
        Initialize an instance of the Media Control package.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface SsdkInterface
        Parameters:
        context - The context for your applicatiom

        Throws:
        SsdkUnsupportedException - Thrown when Samsung Mobile SDK is not supported on the device.

      • isFeatureEnabled

        public boolean isFeatureEnabled(int id)
        Check if the Media Control package is available on the device.

        Specified by:
        isFeatureEnabled in interface SsdkInterface
        Parameters:
        id - The ID indicating the Media Control package.
        Returns:
        • true - if the Media Control package is available on the device.
        • false - if the Media Control package is not available on the device.

      • getVersionCode

        public int getVersionCode()
        Get the version number of the Media Control package.

        Specified by:
        getVersionCode in interface SsdkInterface
        Returns:
        The Media Control package version number. The current version number is 1.

      • getVersionName

        public String getVersionName()
        Get the version name of the Media Control package.

        Specified by:
        getVersionName in interface SsdkInterface
        Returns:
        The Media Control package version name. The current version name is “1.0.0”.
